group_1.textLeft: Urgh... Kamihama Magical Girls are total@beasts... We can't beat them at all...

group_1.textRight: Why... Why? I can't understand... Liberation@is so close, so why?

group_1.textLeft: I think that's enough for now.

group_1.textRight: *Pant* *Pant* There, that's...good. That's@good, right?

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry... I should've held them back...

group_1.textRight: It's not your fault.
I should've worded it differently.

group_1.textLeft: Precisely...
If we'd never known, then we wouldn't be@agonizing over it now!
We'd be able to just pursue liberation...
We wouldn't be fighting amongst ourselves@and tearing each other apart...

group_1.textRight: You still would have found out someday.
You can't run away from the things you've@done.
Someday you WILL have to face up to them.

group_1.textLeft: Must be nice for you.
You have friends who will accept what you've@done.
That's why you can talk like that!
It's not fair... It's completely unfair...
You're strong, AND you have friends who@care for you...

group_1.textRight: I have no idea what I should do at all...

group_1.textLeft: It's because of all of you...
You were too easy on this fake saint, and@now she's spoiled rotten.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, that's right... If all of you had just@never come to this place...

group_1.textLeft: Bunch of hypocrites... I'll never forgive@them.

group_1.textRight: If we could at least take one of her friends@down with us...

group_1.textCenter: They have nothing to do with what I did!

group_1.textRight: Wait, Mami. That's not true.

group_1.textLeft: What?

group_1.textRight: We decided to accept you as you are, no@matter what.
We're not going to just abandon you when@you're in trouble.

group_1.textLeft: But...this is my problem.
There's no need for you to take the blame.

group_1.textRight: Even so.

group_1.textLeft: But...

group_1.textRight: Well, I guess she just won't get it unless we@spell it out.

group_1.textLeft: Yes... Just showing her doesn't seem to be@enough to convince her.

group_1.textRight: Whenever you're struggling, let us be by@your side.
When you just can't get to your feet and@you're not able to move forward...
Grab our hands, just like this, and let us@walk with you.
Because no matter what, no matter when...
We're on your side.
We're your allies!
Your friends!

group_1.textLeft: Girls...[wait:1.5][chara:200500:lipSynch_1] I don't know what to say...

group_1.narration: I thought I couldn't rely on them,@or anyone else, until this was all over.
I had decided to take responsibility and put@an end to everything, since it was my fault.

group_1.textRight: We've always believed in you, Mami.
We always knew you'd come back to us.
We want to make sure we understand each other@this time.
We don't want to just lean on you, we want@to support each other.
That's why we came to Kamihama.
Those things you did when you were with the@Wings of the Magius...
We already decided a long time ago that@we'd help you deal with the fallout!

group_1.textLeft: I... I...don't know what to...
(I... I have no words...)

group_1.narration: I guess...@it's okay to rely on them...

group_1.textLeft: *Sob* *Sob* I...

group_1.textRight: It's all right. You're all right now, Mami.
We're here. We're right here with you.
Look down... We're all holding hands.

group_1.narration: I could feel the tight lump I'd had in my@chest slowly start to dissolve at last.
What they said...@The warmth of their hands in mine...@All of it helped it come undone.
It's all right now...@It really, really is.
After all...@Now, I can trust them.
No matter what happens,@we can face it together.

group_1.textCenter: (I have to tell them that...in my own words!)
If you do... I'll feel just a little bit less@scared.
Do you guys have someone like that?

group_1.textLeft: What?

group_1.textRight: Someone whose words you'd trust@unconditionally.
Do you have someone like that?

group_1.textLeft: Of course we donâ€”

group_1.textRight: ...Mifuyu...

group_1.textLeft: Oh...

group_1.textRight: If it were Mifuyu...

group_1.textLeft: I... I could trust her...

group_1.textRight: I could too...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...if it were Mifuyu...

group_1.textRight: Same for me...
But Mifuyu must already know about this.

group_1.textLeft: So she was just using us like disposable@pawns from the very start?

group_1.textRight: No! [chara:715102:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:715102:cheek_0][chara:715102:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:715102:lipSynch_1]She'd never...

group_1.textLeft: She'd never do something like that.

group_1.textRight: Ugh... I don't know what the truth is@anymore...

group_1.textLeft: I want to hear from her... I want to hear @what she has to say...
